mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `wallet_change_record` ( `record_id`, `user_id`, `left_rmb`, `note`, `create_time`, `change_rmb`, `record_type`, `record_state` ) SELECT #{change_record_id}, a.user_id, b.rmb + a.rmb left_rmb, '会员充值', NOW(), a.rmb, '1', '1' FROM recharge_record a, wallet b WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id AND a.`record_id` = #{record_id}

INSERT INTO `wallet_change_record` ( `record_id`, `user_id`, `left_rmb`, `note`, `create_time`, `change_rmb`, `record_type`, `record_state` ) SELECT #{record_id}, user_id, `balance` + `daily_dividend` left_rmb, '每日解封', NOW(), `daily_dividend` change_rmb, '2', '1' FROM `wallet` WHERE user_id = #{user_id}

INSERT INTO `wallet_change_record` ( `record_id`, `user_id`, `left_rmb`, `note`, `create_time`, `change_rmb`, `record_type`, `record_state` ) SELECT #{change_record_id}, a.user_id, b.rmb + a.rmb * c.indirect_reward / 100 left_rmb, '二级推荐奖励', NOW(), a.rmb * c.indirect_reward / 100, '1', '1' FROM recharge_record a, wallet b WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id AND a.`record_id` = #{record_id}

INSERT INTO `wallet_change_record` ( `record_id`, `user_id`, `left_rmb`, `note`, `create_time`, `change_rmb`, `record_type`, `record_state` ) SELECT #{change_record_id}, a.user_id, b.rmb + a.rmb * c.direct_reward / 100 left_rmb, '一级推荐奖励', NOW(), a.rmb * c.direct_reward / 100, '1', '1' FROM recharge_record a, wallet b , sys_param c WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id AND a.`record_id` = #{record_id}

INSERT INTO `wallet_change_record` ( `record_id`, `user_id`, `left_rmb`, `note`, `create_time`, `change_rmb`, `record_type`, `record_state` ) SELECT #{change_record_id}, a.user_id, b.balance - a.rmb left_rmb, '提现', NOW(), a.rmb, '3', '0' FROM withdrawal_record a, wallet b WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id AND a.`record_id` = #{record_id}
